scripts.prisma-pull-generate: cd schemas/$SCHEMA && bunx prisma db pull
scripts.prisma-pull-generate-all: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do SCHEMA=$schema pnpm prisma-pull-generate; done && pnpm prisma-generate-all
scripts.prisma-generate-all: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do SCHEMA=$schema pnpm prisma-generate; done && rm -rf dist
scripts.prisma-migrate: cd schemas/$SCHEMA && bunx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma-migrate-all: cd schemas && ls | while read -r schema; do SCHEMA=$schema pnpm prisma-migrate; done
scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate -d && bash wait-until-db-ready.bash
